p.s: The given text is an excerpt of a political speech, which was given by Boris Johnson, who is the British Prime Minister, on the COP26, which is a conference of the world leaders, on November 1th 2021, in Glasgow.
The speech is, also as the COP26 in general, about the climate change and what we have to do aggainstagainst it.
Boris Johnson points out his idea of climate crisis and the role and importance of COP26.
For Boris Johnson the climate change is definellydefinitely real and already happening (cf. l. 6).
The temperature is already raising and time, which is left, to do something against it, is running (cf. l. 5).
In addition, in his opinion the climate change is completely created by mankind, especially by the industrialized countries (cf. l. 19).
So in Boris Johnson's opinion we have to act now, and stop just talking, what we did for the last years, as he claims.
He stresses that we have the duty to do something, as the following generations would suffer under the climate change, when we continue to do nothing.
Also the industrialized countries have the duty to help the other countries with financed funds, as they created this climate crisis.
But Johnson is convinced that we are able and have the remedies and opportunities to fight against the climate change.
So we just have to show the wheel to this danger.
For Boris Johnson the COP26 playesplays a very important role in this fight against climate crisis.
If the world leaders would continue to do nothing and just talk and promise, it could be the historic point of failing (l. 40).
The climate change would go on wivk is rapetlyrapidly speed, so the COP26 has to be the point werewhere the world leaders really start to fight aggainstagainst the climate change (cf. l. 14)
COP26 has to be the beginning and the turning point of fighting aggainstagainst climate change, as Johnson says.

So in conclusion Boris Johnson has the opinion that climate change is a real danger and it is necessary to do some thing aggainstagainst it as fast as possible and the COP26 plays a very important role, for Johnson, as it has to be the beginning of fighting aggainstagainst climate change.
